title: 22g12. Extra compensation above required salary.
text:
An
employer may pay extra compensation to a bona fide exempt employee for working
extended or overtime hours of work on any basis (e.g., flat sum, bonus payment,
hourly rate, straight time, time and one-half, or any other basis, including
paid time off at a later date) without invalidating the “salary basis” requirement.
 29
CFR § 541.604(a)
